mil5.5.5:1.2: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti.
mil5.5.5:1.4: ‘lomasakassapo nāma isi samāno anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajī’ti.
mil5.5.5:1.6_0: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti, tena hi ‘lomasakassapena
mil5.5.5:1.6_1: isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitan’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.5.5:1.7_0: Yadi ‘lomasakassapena isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’,
mil5.5.5:1.7_1: tena hi ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.5.5:1.8: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.5.5:2.2_0: ‘pubbe vāhaṁ manussabhūto samāno sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko ahosin’ti, ‘lomasakassapena
mil5.5.5:2.2_1: isinā anekasate pāṇe ghātayitvā vājapeyyaṁ mahāyaññaṁ yajitaṁ’, tañca pana rāgavasena
mil5.5.5:3.3_0: Ratto rāgavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, duṭṭho dosavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, mūḷho mohavasena pāṇaṁ
mil5.5.5:3.3_1: hanati, mānī mānavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, luddho lobhavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, akiñcano jīvikatthāya
mil5.5.5:3.3_2: pāṇaṁ hanati, bālo hassavasena pāṇaṁ hanati, rājā vinayanavasena pāṇaṁ hanati.
mil5.5.5:3.4: Ime kho, bhante nāgasena, aṭṭha puggalā pāṇaṁ hananti.
mil5.5.5:3.6: “Na, mahārāja, pākatikaṁ bodhisattena kataṁ, yadi, mahārāja, bodhisatto pakatibhāvena onameyya mahāyaññaṁ yajituṁ, na yimaṁ gāthaṁ bhaṇeyya—
mil5.5.5:5.1_0: Evaṁvādī, mahārāja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī ahosi
mil5.5.5:5.1_1: khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
mil5.5.5:6.1_0: Yathā, mahārāja, ummattako khittacitto jalitampi jātavedaṁ akkamati, kupitampi āsīvisaṁ
mil5.5.5:6.1_1: gaṇhāti, mattampi hatthiṁ upeti, samuddampi atīradassiṁ pakkhandati, candanikampi
mil5.5.5:6.1_2: oḷigallampi omaddati, kaṇṭakādhānampi abhiruhati, papātepi patati, asucimpi bhakkheti,
mil5.5.5:6.1_3: naggopi rathiyā carati, aññampi bahuvidhaṁ akiriyaṁ karoti.
mil5.5.5:6.2_0: Evameva kho, mahārāja, bodhisatto saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī
mil5.5.5:6.2_1: ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto ākulākulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
mil5.5.5:7.1: Khittacittena, mahārāja, kataṁ pāpaṁ diṭṭhadhammepi na mahāsāvajjaṁ hoti, samparāye vipākenapi no tathā.
mil5.5.5:7.2: Idha, mahārāja, koci ummattako vajjhamāpajjeyya, tassa tumhe kiṁ daṇḍaṁ dhārethā”ti?
mil5.5.5:7.3: “Ko, bhante, ummattakassa daṇḍo bhavissati, taṁ mayaṁ pothāpetvā nīharāpema, esova tassa daṇḍo”ti.
mil5.5.5:7.4: “Iti kho, mahārāja, ummattakassa aparādhe daṇḍopi na bhavati, tasmā ummattakassa katepi na doso bhavati satekiccho.
mil5.5.5:7.5_0: Evameva kho, mahārāja, lomasakassapo isi saha dassanena candavatiyā rājakaññāya visaññī
mil5.5.5:7.5_1: ahosi khittacitto ratto visaññibhūto visaṭapayāto ākulākulo turitaturito, tena vikkhittabhantaluḷitacittena
mil5.5.5:7.6: Yadā ca pana pakaticitto ahosi paṭiladdhassati, tadā punadeva pabbajitvā pañcābhiññāyo nibbattetvā brahmalokūpago ahosī”ti.
